description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Modal' that renders an accessible modal dialog with backdrop and Escape-to-close functionality. It handles keyboard events, backdrop click for closing, and displays children content with a title and close button.

methods.name: Modal({ open, title, children, onClose })
methods.description: React functional component rendering an accessible modal dialog with props 'open', 'title', 'children', and 'onClose'.

ctags.name: Modal
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Modal({ open, title, children, onClose }) {$/
